mapper.select: select * from (select ROW_NUMBER() over(order by story_id desc) as story_no, story_id, user_id, story_date, story_photo, story_title, story_content from pet_story ps where story_private=0 ) ps2 where ps2.story_no BETWEEN #{start} and #{end}
select story_id, user_id, story_date, story_photo, story_title, story_content from pet_story where story_id = #{story_id}
mapper.update: update pet_story set story_title = #{story_title}, story_content = #{story_content}, story_date = now(), story_private = #{story_private} where story_id = #{story_id}
